DOC.brief_summary: Mechanical ventilation induce pulmonary lesion call ventilator induce lung injury ( VILI ) . High level Transpulmonary pressure one important mechanism VILI use mechanical ventilation . The use bilevel pressure ventilator mode like APRV could generate high level transpulmonary pressure . The aim study evaluate variation transpulmonary pressure use APRV clinician
DOC.brief_title: Transpulmonary Pressure Airway Pressure Release Ventilation ( APRV ) .
DOC.criteria: Adult Patient mechanically ventilate 48 H acute respiratory failure Decision use APRV mode clinician charge patient Contraindication use nasogastric tube
